about.title: About
about.heading: A New Vision of Real Estate Marketing
about.intro: UAP Immo was born from a simple idea: real estate professionals need a faster way to promote their listings — without wasting time or dealing with technical constraints.

points.title: Accelerate Property Promotion
points.text: Drive more buyer attention and generate visits with a streamlined solution made for real estate professionals.

points.title: Create and Share in Seconds
points.text: Our tool lets you build your own property page in one click, with a unique URL ready to share everywhere.

about.conclusion: We believe every property deserves the spotlight. With UAP Immo, you can create your own landing page in seconds — no cost, no barriers.

stats.title: Free Landing Page
stats.text: Create your property page in just one click — no cost, no complexity.

stats.title: SEO-Optimized
stats.text: Your page is built to rank on search engines and attract organic traffic.

stats.title: Targeted Distribution
stats.text: Boost visibility with premium exposure on selected ad platforms.

questions.question: Is creating a landing page free of charge?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. Our platform allows you to generate a custom landing page for your property in just one click — no hidden fees, no subscription. It’s quick, easy, and 100% free to use. If you need more information, feel free to contact us — we’re here to help.

questions.question: Can I edit my property page after it's created?
questions.answer: Yes, you can. From your personal dashboard, you have full access to your property pages. You can easily make changes or corrections at any time — whether it’s updating photos, adjusting the description, or refining key details.

questions.question: Is my landing page SEO-friendly?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Each landing page generated by our platform is dynamically optimized for SEO. We automatically structure your content, titles, metadata, and keywords to enhance visibility on search engines.

questions.question: Do I need any technical skills to use the platform?
questions.answer: Not at all. UAP Immo has been designed to offer a seamless and intuitive experience — no technical knowledge required. Simply fill out a form, and your landing page is generated automatically.

questions.question: How do I share my landing page once it's ready?
questions.answer: Once you complete the property form, your landing page is generated instantly — and the unique URL appears on the screen. You can copy it immediately or access it from your dashboard.

questions.question: Can I track how many people have seen my landing page?
questions.answer: Yes — directly from your dashboard. For each landing page you create, you can instantly view insights like views, traffic sources, and platforms your visitors came from.

questions.question: What’s included in the premium promotion pack?
questions.answer: Our premium pack offers extended reach by distributing your property across multiple advertising platforms. Everything is fully managed so you gain maximum exposure with zero effort.

questions.question: Which platforms will my property be promoted on?
questions.answer: Your property will be promoted on trusted ad networks and social platforms, ensuring visibility among qualified audiences. This includes our own real estate promotion network.

fonctionnementPart1: UAP Immo simplifies the creation of real estate ads with a quick and intuitive online process. In just a few steps, you can generate an optimized landing page for each property. Simply fill out a dedicated form, upload photos, and enter the essential details of your property. Once this information is submitted, our system automatically generates a professional page ready for distribution.
fonctionnementPart2: Once your ad is created, UAP Immo leverages its web marketing expertise to maximize its visibility. We broadcast your ad on the most relevant channels to capture your target audience's attention and attract qualified prospects. With targeted and optimized marketing strategies, we help you effectively convert your audience into potential clients, helping you achieve your sales objectives.
heading: Boost Your Real Estate Marketing with UAP Immo
intro: You want to maximize the impact of your real estate ads and attract as many qualified prospects as possible? Thanks to our expertise in web marketing, we offer you a simple and effective tool to create your own landing pages in just a few clicks.
details: Fill out a form and instantly generate professional real estate ads.
success_message: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
